eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Puerto Rico; AT 07:01 AM ON OCT 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:01 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: ESTO ES UNA PRUEBA THIS IS A TEST Recuerda agacharte cubrirte y sugetarte como parte del simulacro de terremoto ShakeOut de Puerto Rico 2025 Remember to Drop Cover and Hold On during the earthquake drill ShakeOut of Puerto Rico 2025 www shakeout org puertorico
